definition: American musteline mammal typically ejecting an intensely malodorous fluid when startled, defeat by a lurch
details:
noun
- American musteline mammal typically ejecting an intensely malodorous fluid when startled
= synonyms: wood pussy
- street names for marijuana
= synonyms: smoke
- a defeat in a game where one side fails to score
= synonyms: shutout
- a person who is deemed to be despicable or contemptible
= synonyms: stinkpot
verb
- defeat by a lurch
= synonyms: lurch
